backend/main.mo: Main backend canister implementing access control, user/vendor/product data models, and CRUD/query endpoints with authorization checks.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old/new actor state shapes and a passthrough run() function for upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report placeholder with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the functionality of all frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and CSS variable definitions for light/dark themes and color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level router configuration defining public, admin, vendor, and storefront routes with authentication wrappers.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthControl: Login/logout UI tied to Internet Identity with principal display and navigation reset on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Guard component enforcing Internet Identity authentication, showing a sign‑in prompt when needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Role‑mode guard redirecting authenticated users to the role selection page if no mode is chosen.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App-wide layout providing header navigation, page container, and a footer with attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Renders the main navigation bar with role‑based links and active‑path highlighting, showing admin/vendor options only when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/status/Connectio: Displays backend connectivity, version info, and authentication status with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/vendor/VendorPro: Form for creating or editing vendor products, handling validation, backend mutations, and error display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout handling, and identity persistence through a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarketplaceQueries: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching products, vendors, and related marketplace data using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for backend metadata, ping status, and authenticated principal lookup.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoleMode.ts: Manages stored admin/vendor role mode with helpers and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, applying base background and border styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
Displays an admin dashboard with vendor verification and upgrade diagnostics, handling loading, auth, and error states.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the public landing page with feature highlights and navigation to products and role selection.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed product information with price formatting, vendor lookup, loading states, and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/PublicProductsPage.ts: Lists all published products with search, category filtering, error states, and navigation to product detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/RoleSelectPage.tsx: Allows authenticated users to choose admin or vendor mode and navigates accordingly.
frontend/src/pages/VendorLayoutPage.tsx: Page wrapper providing vendor dashboard layout with navigation tabs for profile and products.
frontend/src/pages/VendorPlaceholderPage: Empty placeholder page with no content.
frontend/src/pages/VendorProductsPage.ts: Displays vendor products with loading, error, empty states, and supports creating or editing products via dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/VendorProfilePage.tsx: Vendor profile form allowing viewing and editing company name and logo with loading and mutation feedback.
Lists verified vendors with loading, error, and empty states, allowing navigation to individual vendor storefronts.
Public storefront page showing a vendor's profile and products with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/utils/placeholders.ts: Exports static paths for default product and vendor logo placeholder images.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, writing, and persisting URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color system, extended theme utilities, animations, and typography/container-query/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project state, architecture notes, known issues, and feature definitions for a multi‑vendor marketplace moving into Phase 5.
